definition: to suppress rebellion and quell unrest/to bring calm and order to/calm and peaceful/tranquil
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]

sentences.english: One dieth in his full strength, being wholly at ease and quiet.
sentences.chinese: 有人至死身體強壯，盡得平靖安逸。

definition: Pingding county in Yangquan 陽泉|阳泉[Yang2 quan2], Shanxi
(army) commander-in-chief (archaic)/provincial military governor and civil administrator during the early Republic of China era (1911-1949 AD)
to circulate (a protest or call to arms)/to promulgate
Youzhou, ancient province in north Hebei and Liaoning/Fanyang 範陽|范阳 ancient city near modern Beijing
to enlist enemy or rebel soldiers by offering amnesty/to bring to negotiated surrender
to put down a revolt/to pacify a rebellion
